stp_details.scheme_name: INVESCO INDIA SMALL CAP FUND - DIRECT GROWTH

meta_title: Invesco India Smallcap Fund Direct   Growth - Groww
meta_desc: Invesco India Smallcap Fund Direct   Growth is Small Cap Equity mutual fund with risk-reward rating of 4/10. It has track record of 6 years, with three year return of 29.4. Risk is Very High
scheme_name: Invesco India Smallcap Fund Direct   Growth
exit_load: Exit load for units in excess of 10% of the investment, 1% will be charged for redemption within 1 year.
description: The scheme seeks to generate capital appreciation by investing predominantly in stocks of Smallcap companies.

analysis.analysis_desc: Consistently higher annualised returns than category average for the past 1Y, 3Y and 5Y

Higher alpha: 5.69 
The fund has generated returns higher than benchmark - BSE 250 SmallCap Total Return Index - in the last 3Y

amc_info.name: Invesco Mutual Fund
amc_info.address: 2101 - A-A Wing - 21st Floor,Marathon Futurex,N.M. Joshi Marg, Lower Parel, Mumbai 400013
amc_info.description: Invesco Mutual Fund started their mutual fund on 24/07/2006 and its managing total assets of â‚¹25,182 Cr. Its ranked at 16 as per total assets at end of 30th Sep 2017.
amc_info.more_description:
Invesco Asset Management Private Limited targets to fulfill the needs of the domestic and international market through mutual funds and boasts of a management team that believes to create optimum results for investors. Invesco provides aims to provide excellent financial service to its investors by making sustainable business models, which has helped the company to scale up in the past.

Being one of the best investment management firm, it has an asset under management of USD 934.2 billion. It has dedicated team of professionals who analyze the market with precision,in order to take the right financial decisions.

Invesco believes in having a dynamic outlook in a fast-changing financial world. It offers a wide array of funds, ranging across various market capitalization and categories and they cater to clients in more than 120 countries.

category_info.category_helper_text: Invests in stocks as per Contrarian investment strategy
category_info.tax_impact: If you redeem within one year, returns are taxed at 20%. If you redeem after one year, returns exceeding Rs 1.25 lakh in a financial year are taxed at 12.5%.
category_info.description: Contra funds follow Contrarian strategy which means investing in stocks in contrast to the prevailing sentiment. Minimum investment in equity is 65%.
